text: Standesamt Wongrowitz was a civil registration district (Standesamt) located in Kreis Wongrowitz, province of Posen of the German Empire (1871–1918). This Standesamt was located in and administered the town of Wongrowitz as well as the nearby communities of: {| class="wikitable" |- ! Town ! Kreis ! Polish Spelling ! Type ! 1905 Pop ! Prot. !
